title: Occult - Eldritch Horror Music
description: Occult is a high-quality pack of 17 music tracks composed for use in horror games.
longDescription:
Occult is a spine-chilling collection of 17 music tracks (10 looping), composed for horror-themed games. This pack focuses mainly on traditional instrumentation with string soloists, harpsichord, church organ, as well as a plethora of other instruments which deliver a unique blend of dread and arcane mystery. Perfect for creating a sinister ambiance in games featuring witchcraft, eldritch horrors, and dark rituals, Occult will draw your players into a world of shadows, secrets, and supernatural terror.


Music Demo


This pack contains 15 original tracks with 2 additional alternative versions.


TRACKLIST:

  1. Apparition (Loop) [1:21]
  2. Blasphemers Heavy (Loop) [1:16]
  3. Blasphemers Light (Loop) [1:16]
  4. Coven (Loop) [1:11]
  5. Curse of Hemwick (Loop) [1:16]
  6. Desecration (Loop) [1:36]
  7. Eldritch [1:48]
  8. Eye of Newt [1:01]
  9. Insidious Presence (Loop) [1:46]
  10. Last Rites (Loop) [1:30]
  11. Lunar Ritual [1:45]
  12. Lurking Terror [1:36]
  13. Malediction (Loop) [1:34]
  14. Sacrament [2:10]
  15. The Lagoon (Loop) [0:58]
  16. Unholy Invocation Heavy [2:00]
  17. Unholy Invocation Light [2:00]



Music Quality:

Occult was created with industry-leading software used in professional studios worldwide, each track delivers a polished, high-quality sound, elevating your game to new heights of immersion.


Technical Details:

  • 17 Stereo WAV music tracks (16-bit/44.1kHz)
  • Bit rate: 1411 kbps
  • 264MB uncompressed
  • 26 minutes of music
  • 10 seamlessly looping tracks
  • Royalty-Free license


**If you'd like to learn more about Andrew or his ongoing projects, visit his website here
